message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you first.  Given its value, I think a price of $22,000 is fair. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  $12,000 is quite a bit lower than I'm comfortable with. Could you consider $19,000?
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go above $14,000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
